kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: L'utilisateur lance l'éxecution du composant Felix
Start Application
kw.doc: Starts the process in the ``command`` parameter on the host operating system. The given ``alias`` is stored to identify the started application in RemoteSwingLibrary.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Window Should Be Open
kw.doc: Fails if the window is not open.

kw.name: Select Window
kw.doc: Selects a window as current context and sets focus to it.

kw.name: Push Button
kw.doc: Uses current context to search for a button and when found, pushes it.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Felix affiche un message de connexion
Get Text Field Value
kw.doc: Returns the value of a text component (e.g. text field, password field, text area).

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Window Should Not Be Open
kw.doc: Fails if the window is open. | `Window Should Not Be Open` | window |

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Window Should Be Open
kw.doc: Fails if the window is not open.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Felix affiche un message d'accueil dans le chat
Select Window
kw.doc: Selects a window as current context and sets focus to it.

kw.name: Get Text Field Value
kw.doc: Returns the value of a text component (e.g. text field, password field, text area).
kw.msg: ${message} = * Taper /h pour avoir de l'aide sur les commandes du chat.

kw.name: Should Start With
kw.arg: * Taper /h pour avoir de l'aide sur les commandes du chat.
kw.doc: Fails if the string ``str1`` does not start with the string ``str2``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Switch To Application
kw.doc: Switches between applications that are known to RemoteSwingLibrary. The application is identified using the ``alias``. Subsequent keywords will be passed on to this application.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: System Exit
kw.doc: Uses the RemoteSwingLibrary java agent to call system exit for the current java application.

test.name: Entrer dans le chat [modification d'adresse IP][modification de port]

kw.name: Entrer dans le chat [modification d'adresse IP][modification de port]
L'utilisateur lance l'éxecution du composant Felix
Start Application
kw.doc: Starts the process in the ``command`` parameter on the host operating system. The given ``alias`` is stored to identify the started application in RemoteSwingLibrary.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Window Should Be Open
kw.doc: Fails if the window is not open.

kw.name: Select Window
kw.doc: Selects a window as current context and sets focus to it.

kw.name: Click On Component
kw.doc: Clicks on a component, optionally using click count, a specific mouse button and keyboard modifiers.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Focus To Component
kw.doc: Sets focus to the component. Useful for example when sending keyboard events to a component.

kw.name: Insert Into Text Field
kw.doc: Inserts text into a text component (e.g. text field, password field, text area).

kw.name: Send Keyboard Event
kw.doc: Sends keystrokes to the currently selected component. Keystroke codes must be one of the mappings in ``abbot.tester.KeyStrokeMap`` (https://sourceforge.net/p/abbot/svn/1214/tree/trunk/abbot/src/abbot/tester/KeyStrokeMap.java#l110). Constants from ``java.awt.event.InputEvent`` can be used as optional modifiers.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Selects a window as current context and sets focus to it.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Focus To Component
kw.doc: Sets focus to the component. Useful for example when sending keyboard events to a component.

kw.name: Insert Into Text Field
kw.doc: Inserts text into a text component (e.g. text field, password field, text area).

kw.name: Send Keyboard Event
kw.doc: Sends keystrokes to the currently selected component. Keystroke codes must be one of the mappings in ``abbot.tester.KeyStrokeMap`` (https://sourceforge.net/p/abbot/svn/1214/tree/trunk/abbot/src/abbot/tester/KeyStrokeMap.java#l110). Constants from ``java.awt.event.InputEvent`` can be used as optional modifiers.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Terminate Process
kw.doc: Stops the process gracefully or forcefully.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
